Articles.Content: So what do you think, for me its Dres, the sad lonely thing... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Dres is an angry space potato~ no hugs for it. :/
Eeloo needs GP2 to hug it in its gravitational embrace.
Honestly, Eeloo. Dres has the canyon, the weird inclined orbit, now the 'roads, Eeloo has nothing but distance.
I say Kerbin, it needs cities and roads and clouds.
Moho is the one... It reminds me of myself... Hotaaa! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

I'd say Dres, but now that it swims in an asteroid belt, I'm not so sure anymore.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5GXFzMnCWBs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Everyone feels bad for Dres now.

The new planet I propose we all shower with pity is Eeloo, since so many people want to demote it from a planet to a mere moon. Unlike its analog Pluto, the poor thing doesn't even have a moon. The only reason anyone ever does go there is for bragging rights since it's so far from the sun. Otherwise it just sits there, alone, devoid of both interesting landscapes and Easter eggs.

> 
> Eeloo needs GP2 to hug it in its gravitational embrace.

That would be awesome (and also wasn't that the plan in the long-ago forgotten days?). Or at least give it it's own system of muns, like Pluto has.. and place it at the right distance heh.

Never been to Eeloo. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I'll try to go hug it, but I'll probably just stick around Kerbin's SOI again.
Kerbin needs the biggest hug. The only planet with a sentient race, and all they have to show for it is the craters of all their failed launches unmanned simulations.

Eeloo, hands down. I remember my first landing there. Standing on the snow at the edge of the system, under diminished Kerbol, years and years of travel away from nearest Kerbal...it was saddest, most lonely moment in my KSP experience.
All of them deserve a hug

Pol deserves a De-Bug...so that you don't keep violently exploding at certain places on its surface.

But hopefully this got fixed in 1.0.
No multiple choice?

> 
> Everyone feels bad for Dres now.
> The new planet I propose we all shower with pity is Eeloo, since so many people want to demote it from a planet to a mere moon. Unlike its analog Pluto, the poor thing doesn't even have a moon. The only reason anyone ever does go there is for bragging rights since it's so far from the sun. Otherwise it just sits there, alone, devoid of both interesting landscapes and Easter eggs.

Asteroids for Eeloo now! Pretty fitting as Pluto has lots of stuff in orbit too.
If I were one of those masters, I'd totally build a kerbal hugging, then just tweak scale it up to the size of Eeloo (Y'here me, SWDennis?)

Poor Jool, it has no hugs ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

But at least it has 5 moons to hug it.

> 
> Poor Jool, it has no hugs ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Jool is well loved already though - nobody ignores Jool ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
GP2 needs a hug ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Nobody seem to want to give a hug to Jool. I wish I could reconsider my vote ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Jool has been a nice green friend to me and it herds a whole family of nice moons (all of them except Tylo ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Tylo is not nice).

Dres!

even Eeloo gets visiters because its so damn far away and thus presents a challenge.

but nobody cares about poor dres...
Oh, there's a reason to go to Dres in 1.0 ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Go and hug Jool. I dare you.

> 
> Go and hug Jool. I dare you.

Go and hug Eve.

She is an overly attached Girlfriend that will never let you go again once you got too close to her ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

![DEQGugH.gif](http://i.imgur.com/DEQGugH.gif)
